A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi truly is an outstanding movie. It makes you think\, and delivers twists and turns that you would never expect. As a massive Star Wars fan I was very happy with this film. You must keep an open mind and remember that it’s not going to go the way you think\, and that’s ok. Love the original trilogy\, but remember that this story is vital for the future of the narrative to take Star Wars in the direction that it needs!
